heading: How will your community benefit?
subheading: All profits go straight back to helping and supporting those who need us most. We use the money to help fund essential lifeline services, local initiatives, equipment for community projects and we provide manpower to wherever we think we can help make a difference to a good cause. SY regularly contributes to community crowd funding schemes that may need a capital top-up.

items.title: Community Lifeline
items.description: Supplying older people with iPads and training to get online

items.title: Food Lifeline
items.description: Helping everybody have enough to eat

items.title: Mental Wellbeing Lifeline
items.description: Taking positive action in our communities

items.title: Facing Loss Lifeline
items.description: Supporting You in times of loss

items.title: Aspiring Lifeline
